code:
import{FOOD_ITEMS,CLEAR_FOOD_ITEMS}from'./FoodItemActions';var initialState={items:null};/**
 * FoodItems reducer to update the part of state of the application
 * @param state: Current state value
 * @param action: action received
 * @returns {*} current updated state value
 * @constructor
 */var FoodItems=function FoodItems(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case FOOD_ITEMS:return Object.assign({},state,{items:action.foodItems});case CLEAR_FOOD_ITEMS:return Object.assign({},state,{items:null});default:return state;}};export default FoodItems;
